Text:
WTF indeed... The title annoys me.

WTF...

This title annoys you????  This is an AMAZING record.  How in any way, shape, or form could it annoy you?  The Violin mixed with the lulling voice, it gives me chills.  Just download the track "Many Lives -> 49 MP" if you're still skeptical.  Thanks so much thezulu for uploading this.  His stuff is so hard to find, I really appreciate it.  I say a lot on torrents "i recommend this", but i REALLY recommend this CD.  It's very different from mainstream music, but in the best way possible.
I'm sold FFN1.. I'll give it a go.. thnx thezulu ;)
I Agree - Final Fantasy is an incredible artist.  I bought this CD but broke it :X.  Glad to see this torrent up - thanks!
